I am using a laptop and it doesnt have the first player set of keys. I
cant get into options for the first player to set the keys to
something different. I have tried editing the keyprefs.dat but anytime
I do anything to it gladiator has an error. Im open to suggestions...
The only thing i can think of doing is connecting an external keyboard
then changing it from there.
